contest-event.event-date: April 17, 1999 D Carnegie Invitation Contest (Championship Section) Carnegie Invitation Contest (Championship Section) 100 Entertainments Contest Fife Brass Band Festival carnegie-invitation-contest-championship-section Now known as the Fire Brass Band Festival. Own Choice Test Piece Contest Carnegie Hall, Dunfermline, Fife, Scotland, UK In advance, bands submitted a list of four own choice pieces to the organisers. The organisers then notified each band which of their nominated pieces to rehearse and play. Choices were made to avoid repetitions. Dec. 3, 2014, 2:17 p.m. July 7, 2015, 10:05 a.m. 1 Whitburn Band Gavin Lindsay Harmony Music 2 Newtongrange Band David Hirst 3 Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath) Thomas Wyss Dances and Arias 4 Dalmellington Band John Boax Of Men and Mountains
